title: Quick Shorten
description: Minimal link shortening web app made with React & Tailwind that leverages the Bitly API for shrinking links quickly and easily.

title: Astra Feedback
description: Signup/login web app that focuses on storing user data locally, encrypting user password and opening a feedback form page for showcase.

title: Holo Movies
description: Modern movie database discovery web app built with React and uses OMDb API for fetching movies and their details.

title: AstraPhone X
description: Product landing and preordering page for a fake phone called AstraPhone X, built with React & the Tailwind library RippleUI.
